comments.raw_text:
To improve first run performance, we will be unpacking pre-created SQLite databases from omni.jar on profile initialization (see bug 691268).

This change extracts cookies.sqlite from omni.jar when the database doesn't exist. The extracted DB contains the DB schema but no rows. If extraction fails for whatever reason, an error is logged and the DB is created from scratch as before.
comments.creator: vladan.bugzilla@gmail.com
comments.author: vladan.bugzilla@gmail.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 571810
Code for unpacking the DB when profile is created

To improve first run performance, we will be unpacking pre-created SQLite databases from omni.jar on profile initialization (see bug 691268).

This change extracts cookies.sqlite from omni.jar when the database doesn't exist. The extracted DB contains the DB schema but no rows. If extraction fails for whatever reason, an error is logged and the DB is created from scratch as before.
